name: Space Marmalade (polytely games)
description:
Jeff works as a salvage technician aboard "Class LS" recycling ship scouring the outer fringes of the solar system for space junk.  The menial job doesn't satisfy Jeff whose dream is to one day become a game developer, to this end he has almost finish making his first game.

 We join Jeff on the day before he has to submit his game to the AvdXJam, as he struggles to balance work and his need to finish his game, what could go wrong!
